title: broken webdav - there is html code but should be a link
body:
there is html code visible, but should be link visible. look at screenshot.

how to reproduce
1. try use new installation of owncloud
2. fill all fields during installation (i filled user and password)
3. press finish installation
4. after few seconds you will see message like on screenshot (webdav should not be correctly installed)

### server configuration
operating system:
debian 6 with all security patches

web server: 
server version: apache/2.2.16 (debian)
server built:   nov 30 2012 09:20:31

database:
sqlite -version
2.8.17


php version:
php 5.3.3-7+squeeze14 with suhosin-patch (cli) (built: aug  6 2012 22:32:49)

owncloud version:
owncloud 5.0 rc 2. i installed using git. date: 2013-03-05

### client configuration
browser:
firefox 19 for linux mint

operating system:
linux mint 14 with kde

### logs
#### web server error log
i don't remember when it happened.

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
in logs are only three warnings, but not connected with this bug (it happened much earlier).
warning 	php 	array_walk_recursive() expects parameter 1 to be array, boolean given at /mnt/magazyn/tmp/owncloud/lib/json.php#112 	march 5, 2013 19:39
warning 	php 	array_walk_recursive() expects parameter 1 to be array, string given at /mnt/magazyn/tmp/owncloud/lib/json.php#112 	march 5, 2013 19:39
warning 	php 	array_walk_recursive() expects parameter 1 to be array, string given at /mnt/magazyn/tmp/owncloud/lib/json.php#112 

#### browser log
i don't remember when it happened.

============================

ps. i can't add screenshot.

it's the same screenshot like here -> https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/1909
but text "installation guides" is not link, only html code.
